66911.affected_area: West Kelowna (Westside & La Casa and Surrounding area)
66911.summary: Some customers in the Westside & La Casa and Surrounding areas of West Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
66911.title: Sept 25 - West Kelowna (Westside & La Casa and Surrounding area) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

67232.summary: Some customers in Earl Grey area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
67232.title: Sept 25 - Winnipeg (Earl Grey) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
